name: Bert by Vitoco
description:
Bert

(c) 2022 by Victor Parada

Bert has to change the color of

the 5 pyramids to green, but Bally

tries to make him fail the mission.

Game written for NOMAM's

10-liners BASIC Contest 2022.

Requires:

- Atari XL/XE (or emulator)

- Atari BASIC ROM

- Joystick

- Play the game

- Press fire to start a new game

Game instructions:

- Turn the joystick controller 45

  degrees clockwise, in order to

  handle it with the red button

  centered in the top.

- Move through the spots of the

  pyramid, changing their color

  to green.

- Avoid the ball as it will take

  one try, as well as if you fall

  out of the pyramid.

- When you complete a pyramid, you

  have to continue with the next

  one.

- There are 5 pyramid, and in some

  of them you have to jump in a

  spot multiple times.

- You only have 3 tries to change

  the color of all the pyramids.

- You win the game when all the

  pyramids are converted to green.
